channel.title: Posts on callosum
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on callosum

item.title: Amazing April Fools' RFC
item.description: There is a proud tradition in software engineering to embrace April Fools Day as a source of unending humor. The folks behind various Internet standards are not immune from this. They issued a “RFC” today that has some amazing wry humor in it… suffice to say, we are spreading this around work today… https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc9225.html

item.title: Best topology video I've seen
item.description: This is one of the best videos I’ve ever seen on topology - a subject my brain has always had trouble with. This is an HD upscale of a 10-year old video!
